# [P1] Standardize tokenized spacing & colors in `tailwind.config.ts`

**Labels:** P1, design, code-quality
**Estimate:** 0.5d

## Description
Centralize color palette and spacing tokens in `tailwind.config.ts` and add `src/styles/tokens.md` documenting the tokens and recommended usage.

## Acceptance criteria
- Tailwind theme contains named colors and spacing tokens.
- `tokens.md` documents each token and its usage.
- At least 2 components updated to reference tokens (e.g., button and card).

## Checklist
- [ ] Update `tailwind.config.ts`.
- [ ] Add `tokens.md`.
- [ ] Update references in key components.
